trans-unit.source: An enumeration that specifies handling for a poison message.
A poison message is a message that fails repeated attempts to deliver to the application.
trans-unit.target: 有害メッセージは、アプリケーションへのメッセージの配信が繰り返し失敗したメッセージです。

trans-unit.source: This is applicable only when using a Message Queuing (MSMQ)-based binding.
trans-unit.target: これは、メッセージ キュー (MSMQ) ベースのバインディングを使用している場合にのみ適用できます。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Fault`, which faults the listener and therefore the ServiceHost.
trans-unit.target: 既定値は `Fault` です。これにより、リスナーでエラーが発生し、その結果、ServiceHost でもエラーが発生します。

trans-unit.source: In the case where the service was to fault because of a poison message, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有害メッセージが原因でサービスが失敗した場合は、<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException> がスローされます。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains the `LookupId` of the MSMQ message that can be used to move the message out of the way using System.Messaging API.
trans-unit.target: この例外は、System.Messaging API を使用してメッセージを移動させるために使用できる MSMQ メッセージの `LookupId` を含みます。

trans-unit.source: Certain values of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling> enumeration such as `Reject` and `Move` are only available on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling> 列挙体の一部の値 (`Reject` や `Move` など) は、[!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] でのみ使用できます。

trans-unit.source: You control poison message handling by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase.ReceiveErrorHandling%2A> property to one of the values of this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有害メッセージの処理は、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase.ReceiveErrorHandling%2A> プロパティをこの列挙体のいずれかの値に設定することで制御します。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration code illustrates how to set this property in the service configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 次の構成コードは、このプロパティをサービス構成ファイルの中に設定する方法を示しています。

trans-unit.source: This option drops the poison message.
The message never gets delivered to the application.
If the message's TTL had already expired at this point, then the message may appear in the sender's Dead Letter Queue.
If not, the message does not appear anywhere.
This option indicates that the user does not really care if the message is lost.
Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 適用可能なプラットフォーム : [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)]、および [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This option sends a fault to the listener that caused the ServiceHost to fault.
The message must be removed from the application queue by some external mechanism before the application can continue to process messages from the queue.
Applicable platforms: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, and Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: アプリケーション プラットフォーム : Windows XP、Windows Server 2003、および Windows Vista。

trans-unit.source: This moves the poison message to a Poison Message Queue for later processing by a poison message handling application.
Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
trans-unit.target: 適用可能なプラットフォーム : [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]のみ。

trans-unit.source: This instructs MSMQ to send a negative acknowledgement back to the sending queue manager that the message cannot be received by the application.
The message is placed in the sending queue manager's Dead Letter Queue.
Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
trans-unit.target: 適用可能なプラットフォーム : [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]のみ。
